meanings.definition: The condition or quality of being a dwarf.
meanings.sent1: Her dwarfness made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The dwarfness of the toy made it perfect for small hands.
meanings.sent3: The dwarfness of the puppy was adorable to watch.
meanings.sent4: In the land of giants, his dwarfness was a unique advantage.
meanings.sent5: The dwarfness of the bonsai tree was truly captivating.

meanings.definition: The state of being smaller than average in size.
meanings.sent1: The dwarfness of the kitten made it easy to carry around.
meanings.sent2: The dwarfness of the flower made it ideal for tiny vases.
meanings.sent3: His dwarfness in height didn't stop him from reaching high shelves.
meanings.sent4: In the vast forest, the dwarfness of the squirrel was a blessing.
meanings.sent5: The dwarfness of the model village was astonishingly detailed.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having dwarf-like features.
meanings.sent1: The actress's dwarfness added charm to her role as a fairy.
meanings.sent2: The garden gnome's dwarfness gave it a whimsical appearance.
meanings.sent3: His dwarfness in facial features made him look like a cartoon character.
meanings.sent4: The dwarfness of the statue's face conveyed a sense of mischief.
meanings.sent5: The dwarfness of the mask made it comical and endearing.
